participant_1.name: Oliver
participant_1.personality: Creative and family-oriented, enjoys hands-on activities like pottery and values spending time with loved ones.
participant_1.background: I went to a local antique store and bought a beautiful vase that I now display in my living room. I'd brag about my knowledge of the Beatles' music and history. I spend as much time as I can with my family. I exercise daily to keep my health in check and to have enough energy to keep up with my pets. I live on a boat.

participant_2.name: Samantha
participant_2.personality: Hands-on and creative, enjoys building things and has a passion for music, particularly country.
participant_2.background: I watch highlights of basketball games on my phone while I eat breakfast. I think it's really cool to be able to build things with your own hands. My favorite band is Up. I get to drive around all day while listening to my favorite country music. Others will be impressed by my video editing skills.

content.text: Hi!
Hello there!
What's up?
Not much, just getting ready for my day.
What do you do for a living?
I'm a carpenter.
Oh cool! I wish I could build things. Do you build houses or furniture?
I build both! I love working with wood.
Me too! I like to work with clay and make pottery.
That's really cool! I've never tried pottery.
You should! It's really fun. What's your favorite band?
My favorite band is Up! They're a country band from Nashville.
Oh cool! I've never heard of them. What's your favorite song?
My favorite song is "Here and Now". It's a really good song about love.
Sounds like a good song. I'll have to check it out.
You should! It's a really good song.
What's your favorite thing to do on your days off?
I like to go fishing.
That's a good way to relax. Do you catch anything good?
I caught a big bass last weekend!
That's awesome! I'm not much of a fisherman, but I do like to eat fish.
Me too! I love to cook fish
